intro: Design the home of your dreams with creativity! Choose colours, furniture and practical solutions to create functional spaces full of personality.
description:
Get ready to turn your home into a space full of style and creativity! This interior design game lets you design every room in a fun and entertaining way, whether you're a beginner or a design lover - it's your chance to add a unique touch to every corner and make your home reflect your personality 100%!

Start by learning how to balance colours, textures and shapes to give your home a style all your own. Not sure where to start? Don't worry! Create a detailed plan, choose a colour palette that reflects your personality, select the ideal furniture and organise each space to optimise its functionality. You'll even learn how to light and decorate with art and accessories to give it a personal touch!

Featured Features:

-Create your perfect plan: design each space to your liking, arranging furniture and objects strategically to make your home as functional as it is beautiful.
-Play with colours: explore a wide range of colours and textures, learn vibrant and soft tones to achieve combinations that will make each room stand out.
Unique furniture and accessories: choose from a huge variety of furniture and decorations - everything is at your fingertips to create the home of your dreams!
-Magical lighting: learn how to use light like an expert to give every space the perfect atmosphere, whether it's warm and cosy or modern and vibrant.
-Styles that suit you: do you like modern, vintage or minimalist? Explore different decorating styles and find the one that suits you best.
-Ingenious solutions: no more chaos! Organise your home with clever storage solutions that will keep everything tidy without losing the stylish touch.
-Sustainable design: discover eco-friendly materials and textiles to make your home look great and be kind to the planet too.
-Interactive chapters: experience decorating step by step with fun interactive challenges where you will see your ideas come to life in real time.

This game invites you to unleash your creativity and design a unique and original home - every decision counts and every room is a new adventure! Ready to start decorating and bringing your home to life?
